entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
